mapper.select: select id,contribution,ranking from (select id,contribution,member_level,rank() over(order by contribution desc)as ranking from member where member_level = '1')
select video_no,title from video_tutorial where rownum <=5 order by video_no desc
select discussion_no,title from discussion where rownum <=12 order by discussion_no desc
select qna_no,title from (select qna_no,title from qna order by ref desc,restep asc) where rownum <= 12
select project_no,title from project_write where achieve='모집중' and rownum <=12 order by project_no desc

select exceptionMessage from(select distinct(e.exception_message) as exceptionMessage, er.error_report_date as reportDate from error e , error_report er where e.error_no = er.error_no and e.error_code is null order by er.error_report_date desc) where rownum<=12

select errorCode from( select distinct(e.error_code) as errorCode , er.error_report_date as reportDate from error e , error_report er where e.error_no = er.error_no and e.exception_message is null or e.error_code is not null order by er.error_report_date desc) where rownum <=12
